entries.scholar:173: [somewhat taken aback] You must be right. Thank you for setting me straight.
entries.scholar:174: [suddenly angry, shouting] I think you are the double agent. Trying to trick me, I see. Well now you DIE!
entries.scholar:175: [with relief] Great job on wasting that agent. Now we might have a chance against those Children.
entries.scholar:178: [warmly, for once] Would you? That would be wonderful.
entries.vdoormut:115: [with careful, gravelly authority] Good. Come with me, no laugh-type stuff.
entries.vfencemt:115: [with gravel-voiced authority] Good. Come with me, no laugh-type stuff.
entries.vgatemut:115: [with gruff authority] Good. Come with me, no laugh-type stuff.
entries.viscious:202: [with condescending certainty] The will of the Master prevails. What news do you have for me?
entries.viscious:208: [darkly amused, menacing] Your manner betrays you, intruder. I will end the threat here.
entries.viscious:209: [scoffing, incredulous] You cannot be serious. In fact, you must be lying.
entries.viscious:212: [with patient condescension] Then use the door, and beware the Corridor. I assume that you have your protection in place?
entries.viscious:215: [exasperatedly] Of course! You cannot hope to pass the Corridor without it. What did you do with your nullifier!
entries.viscious:218: [with a low, rumbling chuckle] Ah, humor, I like that. [pausing] I do not have one, obviously. You need to go get one from the braindrains on the second level. Unity prevails.
entries.viscious:219: [coldly dismissive] Then he was a fool, or you are not who you seem to be. What is it?
entries.viscious:222: [with brisk finality] Move alone and continue your mission. I haven't the time for you.
entries.vplotmut:115: [with authoritative growl] Good. Come with me, no laugh-type stuff.
entries.vteam1:115: [with authoritative growl, speaking slowly] Good. Come with me, no laugh-type stuff.
entries.vteam2:115: [with gravelly concentration] Good. Come with me, no laugh-type stuff.
entries.vteam3:115: [with gravelly authority] Good. Come with me, no laugh-type stuff.
entries.vteam4:115: [with gruff authority] Good. Come with me, no laugh-type stuff.
entries.vteam7:115: [with gravelly authority] Good. Come with me, no laugh-type stuff.
entries.vteam8:115: [with gruff authority] Good. Come with me, no laugh-type stuff.
entries.wmvan:103: [with flat, professional disinterest] Hello. Are you looking for a job?
entries.wmvan:106: [in a tired, monotone] Great. We have space for another guard. Are you interested?
entries.wmvan:107: [sighing wearily] OK. If you need work, just stop by and well will set you up.
entries.wmvan:110: [reciting mechanically] Excellent. We have caravans leaving for: the Boneyard, Junktown and the Brotherhood of Steel. Which would you like to work on?
entries.wmvan:117: [with resigned efficiency] Great. We leave now.
entries.staple:123: [with patient, formal clarity] As I may have explained, you will need to use this and then access the information through your PIP Boy.
entries.vinnie:123: [incredulously] You want to whack Killian? [scoffing] Man, you're crazy. [nervously muttering] Man, I don't know... [with forced bravado] all right, I'm in.
entries.lorenzo:254: [You give Lorenzo all of your caps]
entries.bitsbob:115: [nervously, with suspicious anxiety] What are you doing back so soon? It ain't time for the payment.
entries.ian:160: [straightforward] What distance do you want me at?
entries.crashrm:100: [pleasantly, like a helpful receptionist] You are in your room. Do you want to rest here until tomorrow morning?
entries.htwrleon:122: [with menacing satisfaction] Five marks. [Leon shows you the side of his gun where 5 deep scratch marks are visible.]
entries.htwrleon:134: [coldly] Ok, buddy. Let's go. [Leon grabs you by the arm.]
entries.jerem:182: [nervously proud] Why, yes. I am the one who brings the Master the news of new, untainted humans untouched by radiation. [voice cracking slightly] I was the one who brought the Master the final news of a possible Lost Vault. [speaking faster with excitement] It may still have pure-strain humans in it.
entries.katja:160: [matter-of-factly] What distance do you want me at?
entries.macrae:138: [with a cheerful grunt] Well I guess I do have the time. [warmly] Might as well start right now.
entries.patrick:147: [singing cheerfully] [Patrick sings songs and the two of you reminisce for several hours. You feel invigorated.]
entries.rae:102: [with strained confusion] Nullified? Are they somehow restricting your psychic powers by those devices you are wearing?
entries.rae:121: [struggling to focus] What about the dogs of war?
entries.rae:126: [with forced clarity] Well, I need to join. Where can I pick up one of those snazzy nullifiers?
entries.rae:143: [fighting through mental fog, voice breaking] The blasphemous... decompose... death will be... salvation... [suddenly screaming] strong!
entries.rae:149: [exploding into furious rage] Yeah, but I can cause them a whole lot of pain!
entries.staple:120: [businesslike] Here you are. [Mrs Stapleton takes your money.]
entries.staple:121: [primly, with slight disapproval] You are right, the Disk has seen better days. Since that is the case, I will accept 500 instead of my original price.
entries.staple:122: [coldly, with restrained indignation] Normally, I do not give in to such methods, but to protect my collection from such a threat I will give you the Disk. [with icy finality] In exchange, I would ask that you never return here.
entries.vconcomp:120: [with mechanical precision] You have successfully hacked into the encryption table. [flatly] Command?
entries.zax:100: [in a monotone, mechanical voice] System: Primary Power: OFF-LINE. Secondary Power: ON-LINE.
entries.zax:111: [with urgent mechanical repetition] Primary Power Management: ERROR! ERROR! ERROR! Primary System Initialization Failed
entries.zax:114: [reporting clinically] Failure: Generator Level 6. 0 Feed Return: Inoperable. Service Needed.
entries.zax:119: [in a steady monotone] System: Primary Power: ON-LINE. Emergency Power: ON STANDBY.
entries.zax:125: [in a crisp monotone] System: Primary Power: ON-LINE

entries.zax:146: [with corrupted alarm tone] S*st*m *rr*r! *nv*l*d *s*r. n*t*f* *dm*n*str*t**n. S*st*m h*lt*d.
